comments.text:
Doesn't crash Firefox or WMP for me. What version of WMP do you have on your system?

Sounds like an exploit from last year
http://www.microsoft.com/technet/security/Bulletin/MS06-006.mspx
http://labs.idefense.com/intelligence/vulnerabilities/display.php?id=393

Please apply the patches to Windows Media Player!
comments.creator: dveditz@mozilla.com
comments.author: dveditz@mozilla.com
